title: Default value lost in list box of report parameter after modification
description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: When modifying the default value in the list box of a report parameter, the system should retain the newly set default value.
SR:
1. Create a new report parameter and set its Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa,' 'bb,' 'cc,' and set 'aa' as the default value. Click 'OK.'
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa.' Click 'OK' directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
